description: It uses the ECS execute command API with the command /bin/sh. It also highly refer the similar and pre-existing program ecsgo but uses the AWS SDK for GO v2. Since the motivation for developing the program is personal purpose to study about Golang, the program could be unstable.
summary: execs is a program that helps you to access the ECS task interactively by using the ssm session-manager-plugin.
author: Daeho Ro
